name: TsukaTab
description:
Welcome to TsukaTab, a classic-style JRPG with a modern twist.

You will encounter engaging puzzles, challenging battles, and interesting new friends. The game is designed to be difficult but not frustrating, and it gives you options to customize your heroes almost however you like.

Created with RPG Maker MV
(C)2015 KADOKAWA CORPORATION./YOJI OJIMA
Features monsters from:
Seraph Circle Sideview Monster Pack 1
[Copyright](C) JosephSeraph
Publisher: Degica, Co. LTD
